complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement WordPress Plugin Lifecycle and Admin Enhancements
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of WordPress plugin lifecycle and admin enhancements into detailed steps, including activation/deactivation hooks, uninstall script, admin interface updates, asset management, cache clearing mechanism, and code refactoring for security and standards compliance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple complex aspects of WordPress plugin development, including lifecycle management, admin interface customization, asset handling, caching mechanisms, and security considerations. It requires a deep understanding of WordPress internals and best practices, making it a high-complexity task that benefits from being broken down into several focused subtasks.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Mixcloud-Style Interface with Inline Players and Smart Filtering
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of a Mixcloud-style interface into detailed subtasks covering: HTML structure for list layout, CSS styling, inline player toggle functionality, player embedding, filter UI components, filter logic with API integration, AJAX-based content filtering, and accessibility/UX enhancements. For each subtask, include specific technical requirements, dependencies, and testing criteria.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex frontend and backend integration with multiple interactive components. It requires significant UI/UX redesign, JavaScript functionality for player management, AJAX-based filtering, and API integration. The task already has 8 well-defined subtasks covering all major components. The complexity is high (8/10) due to the need for seamless user experience, performance optimization with multiple media players, and ensuring accessibility across all interactive elements.
